creditline: Gift of Gordon Brodfuehrer in honor of Dr. Andreas Marks
description: abstract image; red and blue mottled ground with high horizon line; brown mottled sky with irregular ovoid spots; roughly triangular forms primarily concentrated at center of image--mottled white and black, mottled grey with red and blue, mottled blue with green and black
inscription: LLC in pencil: 23/25 覚醒の淵-5
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Abyss of Awakening 5
